@clifff @simon 

Here is the retry algorithm, if you were down a day.  They will trickle in vs a massive flood

(0..16).each do |count|
  delay = (count**4) + 15
  jitter = rand(0.5 * (count**4))
  total_delay = delay + jitter
  puts "Retry #{count}: #{total_delay} seconds"
end
